caption: Service is kind of slow which was surprising because there was only two other tables outside with guests. Prices are expensive but relative to the area they are pretty normal. We saw the wait i others before us were experiencing and decided …
Love it the service is excellent my waiters name was Vivian she was great and friendly she  Also she let us swim in the restaurant pool

Took forever to get seated, order drinks, and receive food. We paid $67 (including mandatory tip) for a completely unpalatable margarita (with no apparent alcohol), two very mediocre margaritas, and an actually pretty decent coconut shrimp appetizer. Decided to skip entrees after waiting 20 min for the waiter to take our order
Great restaurant. Beautiful decoration. And the dishes very good. We ate tacos, burritos and enchiladas and everything was perfect. Thank you very much. We will come back.
Best Mexican food around Miami. 😊. Adrian's service was the best.
